name: Turok: Evolution
description:
Turok: Evolution is an action-shooter game developed by Acclaim Studios Austin, RFX Interactive and Super Happy Fun Fun. It was originally released in 2002. It was published by Acclaim Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Turok: Evolution is available on PlayStation 2, Game Boy Advance, Xbox and GameCube.
Jeff Everett produced the game. Nelson Everhart scored the game.
